title: "My fish!" "No, my fish!"
description: A funny little story about three friends and three clever fish!
chapters:
[{"sortOrder":0,"id":153,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 Kicchu woke up early one morning.“It is time to catch some fish,” he said yawning.
","sortOrder":0,"id":252}]},{"sortOrder":1,"id":154,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 He met Choru on the way to the pond. They were best friends who played all day long.
","sortOrder":0,"id":253}]},{"sortOrder":2,"id":155,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 Munia saw them marching with their fishing rods.
  
","sortOrder":0,"id":254},{"originalText":"
 “We are going to the pond to catch fish. Come along Munia, if you wish.”
","sortOrder":1,"id":255}]},{"sortOrder":3,"id":156,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 Little Munia thought for sometime. “Please don’t do that,” she said, “without water, the fish will die.”
","sortOrder":0,"id":256}]},{"sortOrder":4,"id":157,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 They did not listen to what Munia had to say. They headed to the pond straight away.
  
","sortOrder":0,"id":257}]},{"sortOrder":5,"id":158,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 Kicchu and Choru sat waiting by the pond. Two fish swam across, one thin and another round.
","sortOrder":0,"id":258}]},{"sortOrder":6,"id":159,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 Then came the third fish, the biggest one they had seen. Munia said laughing, “It is bigger than Appa’s feet!”
","sortOrder":0,"id":259}]},{"sortOrder":7,"id":160,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 Kicchu and Choru held on tight to their rods.
  
","sortOrder":0,"id":260},{"originalText":"
 Kicchu screamed, “MY FISH!”
","sortOrder":1,"id":261},{"originalText":"
 Choru also screamed, “NO... MY FISH!”
  
","sortOrder":2,"id":262}]},{"sortOrder":8,"id":161,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 Kicchu pulled hard...
","sortOrder":0,"id":263},{"originalText":"
 Choru pulled harder...
","sortOrder":1,"id":264}]},{"sortOrder":9,"id":162,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 
 
 Both the rods broke.
","sortOrder":0,"id":265},{"originalText":"
 
 Kicchu fell to the ground.
","sortOrder":1,"id":266},{"originalText":"
 
 Choru fell into the water.
","sortOrder":2,"id":267}]},{"sortOrder":10,"id":163,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 What had happened?
","sortOrder":0,"id":268},{"originalText":"
 What do you think?
","sortOrder":1,"id":269},{"originalText":"
 The fish had tied up both the strings!
","sortOrder":2,"id":270}]}]

title: 7 Colours of a Rainbow
description: Look around! Do you see the seven colours of rainbow around you?

title: A Day at the Carnival
description: The three mice brothers can’t wait to visit the carnival. They ride toy cars, go on the Ferris wheel, and visit the balloon shop. After some time, they realize their youngest brother is missing! Where can he be?
chapters:
[{"sortOrder":0,"id":188,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 It's carnival day.
","sortOrder":0,"id":349},{"originalText":"
 shouts Little Mouse.
","sortOrder":1,"id":350},{"originalText":"
 shouts Littler Mouse.
","sortOrder":2,"id":351},{"originalText":"
 shouts Tiny Mouse.
","sortOrder":3,"id":352}]},{"sortOrder":1,"id":189,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 They plan to ride every ride!
","sortOrder":0,"id":353},{"originalText":"
 “But don't lose me!
  
 ”
  
","sortOrder":1,"id":354},{"originalText":"
 Tiny Mouse tells his brothers.
","sortOrder":2,"id":355}]},{"sortOrder":2,"id":190,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 They race each other on toy cars.
","sortOrder":0,"id":356}]},{"sortOrder":3,"id":191,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 They go up and down on the merry-go-round.
","sortOrder":0,"id":357}]},{"sortOrder":4,"id":192,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 They ride the winding caterpillar coaster.
","sortOrder":0,"id":358}]},{"sortOrder":5,"id":193,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 They take a spin on the Ferris wheel.
","sortOrder":0,"id":359}]},{"sortOrder":6,"id":194,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 The brothers walk to the balloon cart...
","sortOrder":0,"id":360}]},{"sortOrder":7,"id":195,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 ...and they each
","sortOrder":0,"id":361},{"originalText":"
 buy a balloon.
","sortOrder":1,"id":362}]},{"sortOrder":8,"id":196,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 “ Wait, where is Tiny Mouse? ”
  
","sortOrder":0,"id":363}]},{"sortOrder":9,"id":197,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 Little Mouse and Littler Mouse run to the toy cars.
","sortOrder":0,"id":364},{"originalText":"
 Tiny Mouse isn't there.
","sortOrder":1,"id":365}]},{"sortOrder":10,"id":198,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 They run to the merry-go-round.
","sortOrder":0,"id":366},{"originalText":"
 Tiny Mouse isn't there.
","sortOrder":1,"id":367}]},{"sortOrder":11,"id":199,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 They run to the caterpillar coaster.
","sortOrder":0,"id":368},{"originalText":"
 Tiny Mouse isn't there, either.
","sortOrder":1,"id":369}]},{"sortOrder":12,"id":200,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 They run to the Ferris wheel.
","sortOrder":0,"id":370},{"originalText":"
 Thank goodness!
","sortOrder":1,"id":371},{"originalText":"
 There is Tiny Mouse!
","sortOrder":2,"id":372}]},{"sortOrder":13,"id":201,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 The Little Mice each buy a glass of sugarcane juice.
","sortOrder":0,"id":373}]},{"sortOrder":14,"id":202,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"
 What a fantastic day at the carnival.
","sortOrder":0,"id":374}]}]

title: Lara the Yellow Ladybird
description: A yellow bug in a world of red, Lara the Ladybird just wants to fit in.

title: Shoecat Thoocat
description: Kamala’s new shoecat attacks whoever it meets! Tomatoes, thathas, friends, teachers, goats… everyone hates it. What will they do now?

“OWOOO!”

","sortOrder":1,"id":470}]},{"image":{"imageFormat":"GIF","revisionNumber":1,"downloadUrl":"/image/73.gif","numbers":[],"words":[],"numeracySkills":[],"language":"ENG","title":"storybook-24-ch-15","contentStatus":"ACTIVE","dominantColor":"rgb(144,206,69)","downloadSize":1768,"id":73,"contentType":"image/gif","literacySkills":[],"letters":[]},"sortOrder":13,"id":252,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":" ","sortOrder":0,"id":471},{"originalText":"With a flash of lightning, it began to rain. The no-cat signs melted away.","sortOrder":1,"id":472}]},{"image":{"imageFormat":"GIF","revisionNumber":1,"downloadUrl":"/image/74.gif","numbers":[],"words":[],"numeracySkills":[],"language":"ENG","title":"storybook-24-ch-16","contentStatus":"ACTIVE","dominantColor":"rgb(155,203,69)","downloadSize":502,"id":74,"contentType":"image/gif","literacySkills":[],"letters":[]},"sortOrder":14,"id":253,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Then the thunder started, BA-DUM DUM-DUM! Mirrors CRACKED and crumbled. ","sortOrder":0,"id":473},{"originalText":"Windows slammed against walls and smashed glass flew everywhere, even on the roof. ","sortOrder":1,"id":474}]},{"image":{"imageFormat":"GIF","revisionNumber":1,"downloadUrl":"/image/75.gif","numbers":[],"words":[],"numeracySkills":[],"language":"ENG","title":"storybook-24-ch-17","contentStatus":"ACTIVE","dominantColor":"rgb(153,199,78)","downloadSize":279,"id":75,"contentType":"image/gif","literacySkills":[],"letters":[]},"sortOrder":15,"id":254,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"Kamala hid under her bed.","sortOrder":0,"id":475}]},{"image":{"imageFormat":"GIF","revisionNumber":1,"downloadUrl":"/image/76.gif","numbers":[],"words":[],"numeracySkills":[],"language":"ENG","title":"storybook-24-ch-18","contentStatus":"ACTIVE","dominantColor":"rgb(170,135,172)","downloadSize":615,"id":76,"contentType":"image/gif","literacySkills":[],"letters":[]},"sortOrder":16,"id":255,"storyBookParagraphs":[{"originalText":"The next morning, Kamala crawled out from under her bed. title: The Candy Planet
description: Monsters going to a candy planet for a family trip.

 Afterwards, they called their dad. \"Dad!\" they yelled, \"Yes?\" Dad replied.  The boys said together, \"Are we starting to pack up for Planet Candy yet? \"Yes!\" Dad replied.  So, they started
